actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize additional study and purchase of flood control storage in two Canadian dams.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, and in consultation with the Secretary of State, to cooperate with Canada to complete studies and design of structures for flood storage protection in the Souris River Basin, Canada. Authorizes the Secretary to purchase storage in such structures for the benefit of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to authorize additional study and purchase of flood control storage in two Canadian dams.
